Member AppxReflectiveTrack::expand (in this, in psi_exact)
Study the effect of approximating space or angle first. It doesn't matter in a full expansion, but it does for low orders as they are not independent variables.

Class GMRESIteration
Currently, GMRES doesn't like reflecting boundaries. I'm sure I'm just missing something...

Class Livolant
Livolant, like GMRES, seems to work poorly for reflected conditions. There probably is a proper "consistent" way to include these conditions, but I don't know it yet.
